jira_collector__No_feature_in_jira.jql: key = ${id} AND type != Bug AND status IN (Closed, Done) AND (project = 'CAM' OR (project = 'IDUN' AND cf[32858] = 'Sunflowers'))

jira_collector__Bug.jql: key = ${id} AND type=Bug AND status IN (Closed, Done) AND (project = 'CAM' OR (project = 'IDUN' AND cf[32858] = 'Sunflowers'))

jira_collector__unfinished_tasks.jql: key = ${id} AND status NOT IN (Done, Closed) AND (project = 'CAM' OR (project = 'IDUN' AND cf[32858] = 'Sunflowers'))

jira_collector__open_bug.jql: (project = 'CAM' OR (project = 'IDUN' AND cf[32858] = 'Sunflowers')) AND type=Bug AND status NOT IN (Done, Closed)

jira_collector__Deprecation_done.jql: key = ${id} AND status IN (Closed, Done) AND (project = 'CAM' OR (project = 'IDUN' AND cf[32858] = 'Sunflowers'))

jira_collector__Deprecation_approved.jql: project = "ADP Program" AND type = Deprecation AND "GS/RS Microservices" = "Helmfile Executor" AND status not in (Done, Closed, Cancelled)

jira_collector__Vulnerabilities.jql: key = ${id} AND status IN (Closed, Done) AND (project = 'CAM' OR (project = 'IDUN' AND cf[32858] = 'Sunflowers'))

jira_collector__Abrupt_nbc.jql: key = ${id} AND status IN (Closed, Done) AND (project = 'CAM' OR (project = 'IDUN' AND cf[32858] = 'Sunflowers'))
